hero.title: Rent the Equipment You Need, When You Need it
hero.subtitle: Find the construction equipment you need and book it easily.

features.title: Why Choose Our Platform?
features.subtitle: We make equipment rental simple, safe, and affordable for construction professionals.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Rent equipment in four simple steps

step1.title: Submit Request
step1.description: Select equipment and submit a rental request with your details.

step2.title: Admin Approval
step2.description: Our team reviews and approves your rental request.

step3.title: Make Payment
step3.description: Complete payment after approval to confirm your rental.

step4.title: Get Equipment
step4.description: Receive your equipment and start your construction project.
